data.title: Hey Steve, Where Can I.....
data.meta_description: Pick up that great eight-song CD of yours, 'Long Grass and the Tall Trees', that got three stars in Creative Loafing and has been played on WMNF, WSLR and internet radio Mellow Melodies with Goody and Music Tampa Bay and was also featured on the website eartaste.com? data.meta_site_name: Just Plain Folks Music Organization Message Boards
data.text:
OP

Serious Contributor

Joined:

Posts: 679

Pick up that great eight-song CD of yours, 'Long Grass and the Tall Trees', that got three stars in Creative Loafing and has been played on WMNF, WSLR and internet radio Mellow Melodies with Goody and Music Tampa Bay and was also featured on the website eartaste.com?

Well, I'm glad you asked!! You can now get it at -

Vinyl Fever at 4110 Henderson Blvd in Tampa

Tre Amici at 1907 19th St N in Tampa

When I play live. (By the way, I'm 'live' tonight with Geoff's Evil Twin and Brandon Ruck as we play Musical H.O.R.S.E.)

You can also get it at CD Baby. (But here's a little secret - Shhh! - You can get it for less at Vinyl Fever, Tre Amici and when I play. (Did I mention I'm 'live' tonight with Geoff's Evil Twin and Brandon Ruck as we play Musical H.O.R.S.E.?)

Pick one up today - it's a little bit of money well spent!!!

Steve V (You've all missed the shameless plugs haven't you?)

Steve Vaclavik

http://www.stevevaclaviktwang.com

http://www.myspace.com/stevevaclavik

Long Grass And The Tall Trees Available now:

http://cdbaby.com/cd/stevevaclavik

'You probably don't like what I'm saying, or the way that it's been said. But my only goal has been to awaken some thoughts in your head.'
